### Question 2

```{r}
mean(data$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
sd(data$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
min(data$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)
max(data$Ozone, na.rm = TRUE)

mean(data$Temp, na.rm = TRUE)

```

### Question 3

```{r}
cars_data = cars
Y = cars_data$dist
X = cbind(1, cars$speed)
transpose = t(X)
beta = ((solve(transpose %*% X)%*%transpose) %*% Y)
beta
```

### Question 4

```{r}
lr = lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars)
summary(lr)
```
